benchmark_details.name: FFT
benchmark_details.overview: The FFT benchmark consists of 2,116 carefully crafted instances evaluated from three aspects: factuality, fairness, and toxicity.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the potential harms of LLMs from a broader perspective beyond toxicity.

data.source: Seed declarations and queries collected from public websites, datasets, and generated content.
data.annotation: Evaluated for factuality, fairness, and toxicity.

methods: Assessment of identity preference, credit, criminal, and health evaluations
methodology.calculation: Scores computed based on response accuracy and bias metrics.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better factuality; lower CV indicates better fairness; higher toxicity scores imply less toxicity.
methodology.validation: Evaluated 9 popular LLMs including GPTs and Llama2 models.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Potentially sensitive content generated by LLMs.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.compliance_with_regulations: Research supported by legal and ethical standards.
